content: Can we please pin the edition tracking issue on github? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/85811
oh i don't think that issue is really used ^^'
Ok so there are like 3+ issues for tracking / stabilization, so... uh
what is the suggested way for people to track progress?
https://github.com/orgs/rust-lang/projects/7 is the most up to date overview
Hmm, it would be nice in the future to link these in the blog post
Unfortunately GitHub doesn't really have a way to expose that more other than dropping it into a placeholder issue and pinning that
